description:
Retro styling and modern tech combine in a cool pair of sunnies. With a military-grade anti-fog treatment and a custom-designed frame that promotes airflow, the Hilines keep your vision clear so you can always see what's coming up.

  • Fits medium to large faces best
  • Back side of lens is embedded with military-grade anti-fog material
  • Precisely placed notches in the frame increase airflow to further reduce fogging
  • 3 sizes of rubber nose pads let you dial in the perfect fit
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve offers great coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Hiline Sunglasses - Unisex
